base_query: Create a semantic model to join the datasets Countries and Capitals. For this, predict the semantic labels for the columns based on the DBPedia ontology.
variations: Craft a semantic model to connect the datasets Countries and Capitals, leveraging DBPedia ontology to forecast column labels.
Create a semantic model to integrate Countries and Capitals datasets, relying on DBPedia ontology to forecast column labels.
Form a semantic model to integrate Countries and Capitals datasets, employing DBPedia ontology to forecast column labels.
Build a semantic model to unify the Countries and Capitals datasets, leveraging DBPedia ontology for column label identification.
